name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF DENTAL PLANS
sampleDescriptions: HR 1606, Dental and Optometric Care Access Act; HR 1628, American Health Care Act of 2017 in relation to the business of dental benefits & amendments/repeal to ACA; bills related to changes in federal taxes of dental plans & regulations relating to fees to operate exchanges; HR 3922, bill combining funding extensions for both CHIP & community health centers & bills on which these funding extensions could be considered, operation of Exchanges, including proposed Notice of Benefit & Payment Parameters for Federal Marketplace Plan Year 2019 & Draft 2019 Letter to Issuers in Federally-facilitated Marketplaces; regulatory requirements to register dentists to provide supplemental dental services to Medicare Part C plans.

Issues and policies related to ensuring tax incentives for employers and individuals to purchase dental coverage including the health insurance tax and the Cadillac tax; H.R. 1892 - The Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018- provisions related to the health insurance tax.
H.R. 1892 - The Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018

HR 1606 Dental and Optometric Care Access Act; H.R. 1892 - The Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 - provisions related to extending funding for the Childrens Health Insurance Program;  policies related to maintaining dental benefits under Medicaid; policies related to operation of the Affordable Care Act Exchanges, including enrollment functions and independent purchase of dental benefits.
